thread.title: You’re not fired! Winning ‘Apprentice’ strategy revealed by statistician (The University of Sheffield)
thread.title_full: You’re not fired! Winning ‘Apprentice’ strategy revealed by statistician (The University of Sheffield) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: You’re not fired! Winning ‘Apprentice’ strategy revealed by statistician (The University of Sheffield)
text: ( Source : The University of Sheffield ) A statistician at the University of Sheffield has revealed the best strategy for winning TV show The Apprentice following in-depth analysis of the background and performance of previous contestants.
